Class NCAP

  • java.lang.Object
    • NCAP

  • public class NCAP
extends java.lang.Object
    This class gives a user the ability to control WTIMs through an NCAP by HTTP access.
    Author:
    Rushad Antia

    • Method Detail

      • discoverWTIMs

        public java.lang.String discoverWTIMs(int from,
                             int to)
                               throws java.net.SocketTimeoutException
        Gets all the connected WTIMS to the NCAP
        Parameters:
        from - - starting range
        to - - ending range
        Returns:
        All the found WTIMS that the NCAP has discovered
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException

      • discoverWTIMs

        public java.lang.String discoverWTIMs(int from,
                             int to,
                             boolean continuous)
        Gets all the connected WTIMS to the NCAP
        Parameters:
        from - - starting range
        to - - ending range
        continuous - - true if you want to keep checking
        Returns:
        A list of all the found tims

      • getTIMInfo

        public java.lang.String getTIMInfo(int timId,
                          int timeOut)
        Wifi version only. Allows you to retrieve data such as channels and names of a specified transducer. Retrieves the information about a TIM
        Parameters:
        timId - - The ID of the TIM
        timeOut - - The Timeout in seconds
        Returns:
        Returns the Information about the requested TIM

      • writeToScreen

        public void writeToScreen(int wtimId,
                 java.lang.String arg,
                 int timType)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a message out to the screen
        Parameters:
        wtimId - - The WTIM id Number
        arg - - The text to send to the screen
        timType - - 1 is for Wi-Fi 0 is for the RS232 connection
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Parameters:

        channelID - - The Channel ID

        sensor data

      • getSensorDataRaw

        public java.lang.String getSensorDataRaw(int wtimID,
                                int channelID,
                                int timeout)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Returns only the data no text just data
        Parameters:
        wtimID - - the WTIM id
        channelID - - the channel desired to access
        timeout - - the timeout
        Returns:
        the converted sensor reading
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • displaySensorDataAtInterval

        public void displaySensorDataAtInterval(int wtimID,
                               int channelID,
                               int interval,
                               int numSamples)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        java.lang.InterruptedException
        Retrieves sensor data of a certain sensor at an interval.Works in its own thread
        Parameters:
        wtimID - - The WTIM id
        channelID - - The Channel ID
        interval - - The interval to wait (in seconds)
        numSamples - - The number of times to retrieve data at X intervals
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • startScrollingText

        public void startScrollingText(int wtimID,
                      java.lang.String textToDisplay)
        NOTICE: Invokes a thread to do the text take heed. Starts a scrolling text on the screen of a WTIM.
        Parameters:
        wtimID - - the id of the WTIM
        textToDisplay - - the text to display

      • stopScrollingText

        public void stopScrollingText()
        Stops the text from scrolling. If no text is scrolling on the screen this method will have no effect

      • readRawTEDSFromTIM
